name: Stump Me 2 - Puzzle for Genius
description:
Over 10,000,000 players have been tricked in Stump Me! Now, Stump Me 2 comes and brings you the newest brain puzzles of 2020, can you pass it?

As funny as always, Stump Me 2 contains the newest and most unimagined tricky tests of 2020. But, if you think you can pass Stump Me 2 easily because of the Stump Me experience, then you are already tricked.

Stump Me is nothing to Stump Me 2! Only the ones that can pass this new challenge deserve to be called genius brain. Think you are smart enough after passing the old Stump Me?

Don’t try to be funny. The real smart brain challenge is right here!
Download and play Stump Me 2 to prove how smart you are! How many levels can you pass?

—————————

From the maker (SuperEra Studio) of Stump Me and Mr Spy, Stump Me 2 is your perfect choice of IQ training!
Follow us for the first news and updates:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StumpMe3
Youtube: shorturl.at/vCW28
